name: Square Tokens
description:
Welcome to Square Tokens !

This game is a "corridor" roguelike game where you have to collect as many Square Tokens as possible, but some hunters are wandering in the map ...

  • [W] [UP ARROW]         > Go Up
  • [A] [LEFT ARROW]      > Go Left
  • [S] [DOWN ARROW]  > Go Down
  • [D] [RIGHT ARROW]  > Go Right
  • [TOUCH]                            > Collect / Interact
  • [ESCAPE]                           > Pause

Credits:

https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/

https://www.1001fonts.com/

https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack

Have fun !
